word: der Updates, die There is not enough information provided to determine the plural form of "article updates."
definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the latest modifications, enhancements, or improvements made to a particular software, system, or application. It is typically used to describe the process of installing or applying these updates to ensure that the software remains up-to-date and functions optimally.

examples.german: Ich habe die neuesten Updates installiert.
examples.english: I have installed the latest updates.

examples.german: Bitte führen Sie ein Update durch.
Die Updates verbessern die Leistung des Systems.
examples.english: The updates improve the performance of the system.
